text: Kandɨhɨvɨ hañɨ Pita Jisas kɨyɨmiyɨ pata nɨmavamba kitɨhumi, Aru mɨŋga, krunavundi nandɨ ñiŋgiñɨndu muvat yaŋ ñamba vana andɨti kuŋgɨ kuyɨvahin, sɨhinda muñɨmbɨrɨ andɨti kuŋgɨ kuyɨvahin, kamatataya ututa kuma timu, tamu arɨkinzɨpi tɨŋgɨruramata ñɨmbɨrɨ sɨkwɨ kuŋgɨ kuyɨvata, ambɨhañɨ vaha vahin. Mana pamata ñɨmbɨrɨ sɨkwɨ nuŋandɨ ñamba vana ha kuŋgɨ kuyɨvahin, vami.
